snippet: Oil prices retreated from earlier gains, and there were concerns that the global economy was experiencing a downturn.
abstract: Stocks rise in quiet day of trading.
lead_paragraph: Oil prices retreated from earlier gains, and there were concerns that the global economy was experiencing a downturn.

headline.main: Market Closes Higher After an Up-and-Down Day
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Drifts Higher as Investors Await Guidance
